tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE satellite_positions (
	satellite_id INT,
	satellite_name VARCHAR(50),
	latitude DECIMAL(10, 2),
	longitude DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE satellites (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    altitude FLOAT NOT NULL,
    longitude FLOAT NOT NULL,
    latitude FLOAT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE orbits (
    orbit_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    satellite_id UUID NOT NULL,
    orbit_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    orbit_period FLOAT NOT NULL,
    orbit_angle FLOAT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (satellite_id) REFERENCES satellites(id)
);

CREATE TABLE positions (
    position_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    satellite_id UUID REFERENCES satellites(satellite_id),
    longitude_deg DOUBLE PRECISION,
    latitude_deg DOUBLE PRECISION,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE satellite_positions (
  position_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  satellite_id INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  latitude FLOAT,
  longitude FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE satellite_orbits (
  orbit_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  satellite_id INT,
  orbit_type TEXT,
  inclination FLOAT,
  eccentricity FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE satellite_tracks (
  track_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  satellite_id INT,
  track_start TIMESTAMP,
  track_end TIMESTAMP,
  track_duration INTERVAL
);
